channel.title: PIA on green | hugo-scratch-1 | 0008
channel.description: Recent content in PIA on green | hugo-scratch-1 | 0008

item.title: 0646 Pia Update Failed
item.description: Update failed Please install a terminal compatible with x-terminal-emulator Steps A search didn’t reveal much. Decided to try a manual update by running the script. This worked. An error message happens now on any Linux update. action navigate to /opt/piavpn/var/update bash pia-linux ... run using bash made it possible to use tab completion

item.title: 0718 Private Internet Access not working
item.description: PIA stops working For no apparent reason, PIA was restarting over and over. Uninstall PIA Decided to uninstall the application for now. Found an uninstall script to run. Worth trying again in the future.
